#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
length.ReportCard <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    1x
                    
                      
  length(x$get_content())

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
setOldClass("teal_card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Reproducible report

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Reproducible report container class. Inherits code tracking behavior from [`teal.data::teal_data-class`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' This class provides an isolated environment in which to store and process data with all code being recorded.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The environment, code, data set names, and data joining keys are stored in their respective slots.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' These slots should never be accessed directly, use the provided get/set functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' As code is evaluated in `teal_data`, messages and warnings are stored in their respective slots.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' If errors are raised, a `qenv.error` object is returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @name teal_report-class

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_report-class

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot .xData (`environment`) environment containing data sets and possibly

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  auxiliary variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  Access variables with [get()], [`$`], [teal.code::get_var()] or [`[[`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'  No setter provided. Evaluate code to add variables into `@.xData`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot code (`list` of `character`) representing code necessary to reproduce the contents of `qenv`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'  Access with [teal.code::get_code()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'  No setter provided. Evaluate code to append code to the slot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot join_keys (`join_keys`) object specifying joining keys for data sets in

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' `@.xData`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'  Access or modify with [teal.data::join_keys()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot verified (`logical(1)`) flag signifying that code in `@code` has been

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'  proven to yield contents of `@.xData`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'  Used internally. See [`teal.data::verify()`] for more details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot card (`teal_card`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritSection teal.data::`teal_data-class` Code

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom teal.data teal_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  Class = "teal_report",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "teal_data",

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(teal_card = "teal_card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' It initializes the `teal_report` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Accepts .xData as a list and converts it to an environment before initializing

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' parent constructor (`teal_data`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  "initialize",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  "teal_report",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  function(.Object, teal_card = NULL, ...) { # nolint: object_name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
    args <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is.null(teal_card)) teal_card <- teal_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    4x
                    
                      
    checkmate::assert_class(teal_card, "teal_card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    4x
                    
                      
    checkmate::assert_list(args, names = "named")

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    4x
                    
                      
    methods::callNextMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    4x
                    
                      
      .Object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    4x
                    
                      
      teal_card = teal_card,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
      ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' Comprehensive data integration function for `teal` applications

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' Initializes a reportable data for `teal` application.

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams teal.data::teal_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @param teal_card (`teal_card`) object containing the report content.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `teal_report` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [`teal.data::teal_data`]

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' teal_report(x1 = iris, x2 = mtcars)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
teal_report <- function(...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
                        teal_card = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
                        code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
                        join_keys = teal.data::join_keys()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(teal_card)) teal_card <- teal_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    4x
                    
                      
  methods::new(

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    4x
                    
                      
    "teal_report",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    4x
                    
                      
    .xData = list2env(list(...)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    4x
                    
                      
    teal_card = teal_card,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    4x
                    
                      
    join_keys = join_keys,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    4x
                    
                      
    code = code

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_report

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`qenv` or `teal_data`) object to convert to `teal_report`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
as.teal_report <- function(x) { # nolint: object_name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_class(x, "qenv")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
  if (inherits(x, "teal_report")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    return(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
  new_x <- teal_report()

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
  for (slot_name in methods::slotNames(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
    methods::slot(new_x, slot_name) <- methods::slot(x, slot_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
  teal_card(new_x) <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    teal_card(new_x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
    code_chunk(teal.code::get_code(new_x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
  new_x

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @inherit teal.code::eval_code

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`teal_report`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param keep_output (`character` or `NULL`) Names of output objects in the environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' that are will be added in the card for the reporter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' These are shown in the card via the [tools::toHTML()] and [to_rmd()] implementations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param code_block_opts (`list`) Additional options for the R code chunk in R Markdown.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `teal_reporter` environment with the code evaluated and the outputs added

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' to the card or `qenv.error` if evaluation fails.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom teal.code eval_code

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  "eval_code",

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "teal_report"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
  function(object, code, keep_output = NULL, code_block_opts = list(), ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    4x
                    
                      
    new_object <- methods::callNextMethod(object = object, code = code, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (inherits(new_object, "error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
      return(new_object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    4x
                    
                      
    checkmate::assert(

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    4x
                    
                      
      combine = "and",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    4x
                    
                      
      .var.name = "keep_output",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    4x
                    
                      
      checkmate::check_character(keep_output, null.ok = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    4x
                    
                      
      checkmate::check_subset(keep_output, ls(new_object, all.names = TRUE), empty.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    4x
                    
                      
    new_code <- .preprocess_code(code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (length(new_code)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    4x
                    
                      
      teal_card(new_object) <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    4x
                    
                      
        teal_card(new_object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    4x
                    
                      
        do.call(code_chunk, args = c(list(code = new_code), code_block_opts))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    4x
                    
                      
      teal_card(new_object) <- Reduce(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    4x
                    
                      
        function(result, this) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    4x
                    
                      
          this_output <- new_object[[this]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    4x
                    
                      
          c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    4x
                    
                      
            result,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    4x
                    
                      
            structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    4x
                    
                      
              this_output,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    4x
                    
                      
              class = c("chunk_output", class(this_output))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
        },

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    4x
                    
                      
        init = teal_card(new_object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    4x
                    
                      
        x = keep_output

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    4x
                    
                      
    new_object

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
.preprocess_code <- getFromNamespace(".preprocess_code", "teal.code")

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title `RcodeBlock`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @docType class

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Specialized `ContentBlock` designed to embed `R` code in reports.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
RcodeBlock <- R6::R6Class( # nolint: object_name_linter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
  classname = "RcodeBlock",

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
  inherit = ContentBlock,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
  public = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Initialize a `RcodeBlock` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
    #' @details Returns a `RcodeBlock` object with no content and no parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param content (`character(1)` or `character(0)`) a string assigned to this `RcodeBlock`

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param ... any `rmarkdown` `R` chunk parameter and it value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return Object of class `RcodeBlock`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    initialize = function(content = character(0), ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    75x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_class(content, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    75x
                    
                      
      super$set_content(content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    75x
                    
                      
      self$set_params(list(...))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    75x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Sets content of this `RcodeBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param content (`any`) R object

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `self`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$set_content("a <- 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    set_content = function(content) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    11x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_string(content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    10x
                    
                      
      super$set_content(content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Sets the parameters of this `RcodeBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    #' @details Configures `rmarkdown` chunk parameters for the `R` code block,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    #' influencing its rendering and execution behavior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param params (`list`) any `rmarkdown` R chunk parameter and its value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `self`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$set_params(list(echo = TRUE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    set_params = function(params) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    133x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_list(params, names = "named")

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    133x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_subset(names(params), self$get_available_params())

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    133x
                    
                      
      private$params <- params

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    133x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Get the parameters of this `RcodeBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `character` the parameters of this `RcodeBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$get_params()

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    get_params = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    3x
                    
                      
      private$params

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Get available array of parameters available to this `RcodeBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return A `character` array of parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$get_available_params()

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    get_available_params = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    5x
                    
                      
      names(knitr::opts_chunk$get())

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Create the `RcodeBlock` from a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param x (`named list`) with two fields `text` and `params`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    #' Use the `get_available_params` method to get all possible parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `self`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$from_list(list(text = "sth", params = list()))

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    from_list = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    3x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_list(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    3x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_names(names(x), must.include = c("text", "params"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    3x
                    
                      
      self$set_content(x$text)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    3x
                    
                      
      self$set_params(x$params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    3x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Convert the `RcodeBlock` to a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `named list` with a text and `params`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    #' RcodeBlock <- getFromNamespace("RcodeBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- RcodeBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$to_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    to_list = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    3x
                    
                      
      list(text = self$get_content(), params = self$get_params())

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  private = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    content = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    params = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  lock_objects = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  lock_class = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
.content_to_rmd <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    6x
                    
                      
  suppressWarnings(hashname <- rlang::hash(block))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    6x
                    
                      
  hashname_file <- paste0(hashname, ".rds")

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    6x
                    
                      
  path <- tempfile(fileext = ".rds")

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    6x
                    
                      
  suppressWarnings(saveRDS(block, file = path))

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    6x
                    
                      
  file.copy(path, file.path(output_dir, hashname_file))

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    6x
                    
                      
  sprintf("```{r echo = FALSE}\nreadRDS('%s')\n```", hashname_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert `ReporterCard`/`teal_card` content to `rmarkdown`

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' This is an S3 generic that is used to generate content in `rmarkdown` format

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' from various types of blocks in a `ReporterCard` or `teal_card` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' # Customise `to_rmd`

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' The methods for this S3 generic can be extended by the app developer or even overwritten.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' For this a function with the name `to_rmd.<class>` should be defined in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' Global Environment, where `<class>` is the class of the object to be converted.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' For example, to override the default behavior for `code_chunk` class, you can use:

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' ```r

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' to_rmd.code_chunk <- function(block, output_dir, ..., report_type, eval = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   # custom implementation

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   sprintf("### A custom code chunk\n\n```{r}\n%s\n```\n", block)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' ```

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' Alternatively, you can register the S3 method using `registerS3method("to_rmd", "<class>", fun)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param block (`any`) content which can be represented in `rmarkdown` syntax

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param output_dir (`character(1)`) path to the directory where files should be written to.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `character(1)` containing a content or `rmarkdown` document

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
to_rmd <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    46x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("to_rmd")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @method to_rmd default

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
to_rmd.default <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    46x
                    
                      
  .to_rmd(block, output_dir, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    46x
                    
                      
  UseMethod(".to_rmd")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @method .to_rmd default

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd.default <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
  block

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @method .to_rmd Reporter

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd.Reporter <- function(block,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
                             output_dir,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
                             yaml_header,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
                             global_knitr = getOption("teal.reporter.global_knitr"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                             include_chunk_output,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                             ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    8x
                    
                      
  blocks <- block$get_blocks()

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    8x
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_subset(names(global_knitr), names(knitr::opts_chunk$get()))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (missing(yaml_header)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    yaml_header <- md_header(yaml::as.yaml(list(title = "Report")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    8x
                    
                      
  report_type <- get_yaml_field(yaml_header, "output")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    8x
                    
                      
  parsed_global_knitr <- sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    8x
                    
                      
    "\n```{r setup, include=FALSE}\nknitr::opts_chunk$set(%s)\n%s\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    8x
                    
                      
    utils::capture.output(dput(global_knitr)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (identical(report_type, "powerpoint_presentation")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
      format_code_block_function <- quote(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
        code_block <- function(code_text) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
          df <- data.frame(code_text)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::flextable(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::delete_part(ft, part = "header")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::autofit(ft, add_h = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::fontsize(ft, size = 7, part = "body")

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::bg(x = ft, bg = "lightgrey")

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
          ft <- flextable::border_outer(ft)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
          if (flextable::flextable_dim(ft)$widths > 8) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
            ft <- flextable::width(ft, width = 8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
          ft

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      paste(deparse(format_code_block_function), collapse = "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
      ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    8x
                    
                      
  parsed_blocks <- paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    8x
                    
                      
    unlist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    8x
                    
                      
      lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    8x
                    
                      
        blocks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    8x
                    
                      
        function(b) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    38x
                    
                      
          to_rmd(

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    38x
                    
                      
            b,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    38x
                    
                      
            output_dir = output_dir,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    38x
                    
                      
            report_type = report_type,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    38x
                    
                      
            include_chunk_output = include_chunk_output

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    8x
                    
                      
    collapse = "\n\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    8x
                    
                      
  rmd_text <- paste0(yaml_header, "\n", parsed_global_knitr, "\n", parsed_blocks, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    8x
                    
                      
  input_path <- file.path(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    8x
                    
                      
    output_dir,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
    sprintf("input_%s.Rmd", gsub("[.]", "", format(Sys.time(), "%Y%m%d%H%M%OS3")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    8x
                    
                      
  cat(rmd_text, file = input_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    8x
                    
                      
  input_path

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    121

#' @method .to_rmd TextBlock

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd.TextBlock <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    12x
                    
                      
  text_style <- block$get_style()

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    12x
                    
                      
  block_content <- block$get_content()

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    12x
                    
                      
  switch(text_style,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    6x
                    
                      
    "default" = block_content,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    "verbatim" = sprintf("\n```\n%s\n```\n", block_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    6x
                    
                      
    "header2" = paste0("## ", block_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    "header3" = paste0("### ", block_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
    block_content

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
}
