#' @method .to_rmd RcodeBlock

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd.RcodeBlock <- function(block, output_dir, ..., report_type) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
  params <- block$get_params()

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
  params <- lapply(params, function(l) if (is.character(l)) shQuote(l) else l)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
  if (identical(report_type, "powerpoint_presentation")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
    block_content_list <- split_text_block(block$get_content(), 30)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
      sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
        "\\newpage\n\n---\n\n```{r, echo=FALSE}\ncode_block(\n%s)\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
        shQuote(block_content_list, type = "cmd")

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
      collapse = "\n\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
    sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
      "\\newpage\n\n--- \n\n```{r, %s}\n%s\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
      paste(names(params), params, sep = "=", collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
      block$get_content()

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @method .to_rmd code_chunk

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
.to_rmd.code_chunk <- function(block, output_dir, ..., report_type, eval = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
  params <- attr(block, "params")

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!("eval" %in% names(params))) params <- c(params, eval = eval)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
  params <- lapply(params, function(l) if (is.character(l)) shQuote(l) else l)

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
  if (identical(report_type, "powerpoint_presentation")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
    block_content_list <- split_text_block(block, 30)

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
      sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    !
                    
                      
        "\\newpage\n\n---\n\n```{r, echo=FALSE}\ncode_block(\n%s)\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    !
                    
                      
        shQuote(block_content_list, type = "cmd")

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
      collapse = "\n\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
    sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
      "```{r, %s}\n%s\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
      paste(names(params), params, sep = "=", collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
      block

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
}

.to_rmd.PictureBlock <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    6x
                    
                      
  basename_pic <- basename(block$get_content())

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    6x
                    
                      
  file.copy(block$get_content(), file.path(output_dir, basename_pic))

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    6x
                    
                      
  params <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    6x
                    
                      
    `out.width` = "'100%'",

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    6x
                    
                      
    `out.height` = "'100%'"

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    6x
                    
                      
  title <- block$get_title()

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (length(title)) params["fig.cap"] <- shQuote(title)

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    6x
                    
                      
  sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    6x
                    
                      
    "\n```{r, echo = FALSE, %s}\nknitr::include_graphics(path = '%s')\n```\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    6x
                    
                      
    paste(names(params), params, sep = "=", collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    6x
                    
                      
    basename_pic

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
}

.to_rmd.HTMLBlock <- function(block, output_dir, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !

                    219
                    !

                    220
                    !

.to_rmd.chunk_output <- function(block, output_dir, ..., include_chunk_output) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!missing(include_chunk_output) && isTRUE(include_chunk_output)) {

    NextMethod()

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title `teal_card`: An `S3` class for managing `teal` reports

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The `teal_card` `S3` class provides functionality to store, manage, edit, and adjust report contents.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' It enables users to create, manipulate, and serialize report-related data efficiently.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The `teal_card()` function serves two purposes:

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. When called with a `teal_report` object, it acts as a getter and returns the card slot

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' 2. When called with other arguments, it creates a new `teal_card` object from those arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return An `S3` `list` of class `teal_card`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x A `teal_report` object to extract card from, or any other object to include in a new `teal_card`

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional elements to include when creating a new `teal_card`

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @details The `teal_card` class supports `c()` and `x[i]` methods for combining and subsetting elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' However, these methods only function correctly when the first element is a `teal_card`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' # Create a new empty card

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' report <- teal_card()

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' class(report) # Check the class of the object

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' # Create a card with content

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' report <- teal_card("## Headline", "Some text", summary(iris))

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' # Extract card from a teal_report

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' tr <- teal_report(teal_card = teal_card("## Title"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' doc <- teal_card(tr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' # Add elements to the report

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' report <- c(report, list("## Table"), list(summary(mtcars)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' # Subset the report to keep only the first two elements

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' report <- report[1:2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' # Append new elements after the first element

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' report <- append(report, c(list("## Table 2"), list(summary(mtcars))), after = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' # Verify that the object remains a teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' class(report)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @name teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
teal_card <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    94x
                    
                      
  if (missing(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    6x
                    
                      
    structure(list(), class = "teal_card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    88x
                    
                      
  } else if (inherits(x, "teal_report")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    17x
                    
                      
    x@teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    71x
                    
                      
    objects <- list(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    71x
                    
                      
    structure(objects, class = "teal_card")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value (`teal_card`) object to set in the `teal_report`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
`teal_card<-` <- function(x, value) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    8x
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_class(x, "teal_report")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    8x
                    
                      
  x@teal_card <- as.teal_card(value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    8x
                    
                      
  x

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' Create or coerce to a teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' This function ensures that input is converted to a teal_card object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' It accepts various input types and converts them appropriately.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x Object to convert to teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A teal_card object

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
as.teal_card <- function(x) { # nolint: object_name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (inherits(x, "teal_card")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    8x
                    
                      
    return(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.list(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
    return(do.call(teal_card, x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
  teal_card(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
c.teal_card <- function(...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    44x
                    
                      
  dots <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    44x
                    
                      
  structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    44x
                    
                      
    Reduce(

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    44x
                    
                      
      f = function(u, v) append(u, if (inherits(v, "teal_card") || inherits(v, "list")) v else list(v)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    44x
                    
                      
      x = dots[-1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    44x
                    
                      
      init = unclass(dots[[1]]) # unclass to avoid infinite recursion

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    44x
                    
                      
    class = "teal_card"

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param i index specifying elements to extract or replace

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname teal_card

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
`[.teal_card` <- function(x, i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    3x
                    
                      
  out <- NextMethod()

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    3x
                    
                      
  class(out) <- "teal_card"

                    		
                  

                  

                    106

}

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' Access metadata from a `teal_card` or `ReportCard`

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' This function retrieves metadata from a `teal_card` or `ReportCard` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' When `which` is `NULL`, it returns all metadata fields as a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`teal_card` or `ReportCard`) The object from which to extract metadata.

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @param which (`character` or `NULL`) The name of the metadata field to extract.

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list of metadata fields or a specific field if `which` is provided.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
metadata <- function(object, which = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    78x
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_string(which, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    78x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("metadata", object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
metadata.teal_card <- function(object, which = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    78x
                    
                      
  metadata <- attr(object, which = "metadata", exact = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    78x
                    
                      
  result <- metadata %||% list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    78x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(which)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    35x
                    
                      
    return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    43x
                    
                      
  result[[which]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
metadata.ReportCard <- function(object, which = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
  # TODO: soft deprecate

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
  result <- list(title = object$get_name())

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.null(which)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
    return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
  result[[which]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Set metadata for a `teal_card` or `ReportCard`

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' This function allows you to set or modify metadata fields in a `teal_card` or `ReportCard` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' It can be used to add new metadata or update existing fields.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`teal_card` or `ReportCard`) The object to modify.

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @param which (`character`) The name of the metadata field to set.

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @param value The value to assign to the specified metadata field.

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The modified object with updated metadata.

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
`metadata<-` <- function(object, which, value) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    47x
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_string(which)

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    47x
                    
                      
  UseMethod("metadata<-", object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname metadata-set

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
`metadata<-.teal_card` <- function(object, which, value) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    35x
                    
                      
  attr(object, which = "metadata") <- utils::modifyList(

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    35x
                    
                      
    metadata(object), structure(list(value), names = which)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    35x
                    
                      
  object

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname metadata-set

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' The `ReportCard` class only supports the `title` field in metadata.

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
`metadata<-.ReportCard` <- function(object, which, value) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    12x
                    
                      
  if (which != "title") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("ReportCard class only supports `title` in metadata.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    12x
                    
                      
    object$set_name(value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    12x
                    
                      
  object

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' Generate an R Markdown code chunk

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' This function creates a `code_chunk` object, which represents an R Markdown

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' code chunk. It stores the R code and any specified chunk options (e.g., `echo`, `eval`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#' These objects are typically processed later to generate the final R Markdown text.

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' @param code A character string containing the R code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional named parameters to be included as chunk options (e.g., `echo = TRUE`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' @return An object of class `code_chunk`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' my_chunk <- code_chunk("x <- 1:10", echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' class(my_chunk)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' attributes(my_chunk)$param

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
code_chunk <- function(code, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    5x
                    
                      
  checkmate::assert_character(code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    5x
                    
                      
  params <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    5x
                    
                      
  structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    5x
                    
                      
    paste(code, collapse = "\n"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    5x
                    
                      
    params = params,

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    5x
                    
                      
    class = "code_chunk"

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title `FileBlock`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @docType class

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `FileBlock` manages file-based content in a report,

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'  ensuring appropriate handling of content files.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
FileBlock <- R6::R6Class( # nolint: object_name_linter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
  classname = "FileBlock",

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
  inherit = ContentBlock,

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  public = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Create the `FileBlock` from a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
    #' The list should contain one named field, `"basename"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param x (`named list`) with one field `"basename"`, a name of the file.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param output_dir (`character`) with a path to the directory where a file will be copied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `self`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    #' FileBlock <- getFromNamespace("FileBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- FileBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    #' file_path <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    #' saveRDS(iris, file_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$from_list(list(basename = basename(file_path)), dirname(file_path))

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    from_list = function(x, output_dir) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    5x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_list(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    5x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_names(names(x), must.include = "basename")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    5x
                    
                      
      path <- file.path(output_dir, x$basename)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    5x
                    
                      
      file_type <- paste0(".", tools::file_ext(path))

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    5x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_file_exists(path, extension = file_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    5x
                    
                      
      new_file_path <- tempfile(fileext = file_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    5x
                    
                      
      file.copy(path, new_file_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    5x
                    
                      
      super$set_content(new_file_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    5x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Convert the `FileBlock` to a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param output_dir (`character`) with a path to the directory where a file will be copied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `named list` with a `basename` of the file.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    #' FileBlock <- getFromNamespace("FileBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- FileBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$to_list(tempdir())

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    to_list = function(output_dir) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    13x
                    
                      
      base_name <- basename(super$get_content())

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    13x
                    
                      
      file.copy(super$get_content(), file.path(output_dir, base_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    13x
                    
                      
      list(basename = base_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  private = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    content = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    # @description Finalize the `FileBlock`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    #

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    # @details Removes the temporary file created in the constructor.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    finalize = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    79x
                    
                      
      try(unlink(super$get_content()))

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  lock_objects = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  lock_class = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom tools toHTML

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @method toHTML default

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
toHTML.default <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
  .toHTML(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
}

.toHTML.TextBlock <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
  b_content <- x$get_content()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
  switch(x$get_style(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    header1 = shiny::tags$h1(b_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
    header2 = shiny::tags$h2(b_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
    header3 = shiny::tags$h3(b_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    header4 = shiny::tags$h4(b_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    verbatim = shiny::tags$pre(b_content),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    shiny::tags$pre(b_content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

#' @method .toHTML gg

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
.toHTML.gg <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
  on.exit(unlink(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
  tmpfile <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
  ggplot2::ggsave(tmpfile, plot = x, width = 5, height = 4, dpi = 100)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::tags$img(src = knitr::image_uri(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @method .toHTML trellis

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
.toHTML.trellis <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
  on.exit(unlink(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
  tmpfile <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
  grDevices::png(filename = tmpfile)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
  print(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
  grDevices::dev.off()

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::tags$img(src = knitr::image_uri(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @method .toHTML grob

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
.toHTML.grob <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
  on.exit(unlink(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
  tmpfile <- tempfile(fileext = ".png")

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
  grDevices::png(filename = tmpfile)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
  grid::grid.newpage()

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
  grid::grid.draw(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
  grDevices::dev.off()

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
  shiny::tags$img(src = knitr::image_uri(tmpfile))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
}

                    139

                    140
                    
                    
                      
}

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title `HTMLBlock`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @docType class

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Specialized `FileBlock` for managing HTML content in reports.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' It's designed to handle various HTML content, and render the report as HTML,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' however `htmlwidgets` objects can also be rendered to static document-ready format.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
HTMLBlock <- R6::R6Class( # nolint: object_name_linter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
  classname = "HTMLBlock",

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  inherit = ContentBlock,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
  public = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Initialize a `HTMLBlock` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param content An object that can be rendered as a HTML content assigned to

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    #'   this `HTMLBlock`

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return Object of class `HTMLBlock`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    initialize = function(content) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    11x
                    
                      
      if (!missing(content)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    6x
                    
                      
        checkmate::assert_multi_class(content, private$supported_types)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    5x
                    
                      
        self$set_content(content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    10x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Create the `HTMLBlock` from a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param x (`named list`) with a single field `content` containing `shiny.tag`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    #' `shiny.tag.list` or `htmlwidget`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `self`, invisibly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    #' HTMLBlock <- getFromNamespace("HTMLBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- HTMLBlock$new()

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$from_list(list(content = shiny::tags$div("test")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    from_list = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    2x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_list(x, types = private$supported_types)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    2x
                    
                      
      checkmate::assert_names(names(x), must.include = "content")

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    2x
                    
                      
      self$set_content(x$content)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    2x
                    
                      
      invisible(self)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Convert the `HTMLBlock` to a list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return `named list` with a text and style.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    #' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    #' HTMLBlock <- getFromNamespace("HTMLBlock", "teal.reporter")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    #' block <- HTMLBlock$new(shiny::tags$div("test"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    #' block$to_list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    #'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
